title: Easy BBQ Sauce for Ribs
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 fresh red chilli, finely chopped', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon fennel seed, crushed', '225g (8 oz) ketchup', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
